meanings.sent1: The sound of nails on a chalkboard is the twerpiest noise.
meanings.sent2: Her constant whining is the twerpiest thing about her.
meanings.sent3: The twerpiest mosquito kept buzzing around my head all night.
meanings.sent4: The twerpiest customer at the store was the one who complained about everything.
meanings.sent5: The twerpiest smell in the kitchen was the burnt popcorn.

meanings.definition: in a manner that is the most annoying or irritating
meanings.sent1: She sang twerpiest during the quiet part of the song.
meanings.sent2: He always talks twerpiest when he's trying to annoy his sister.
meanings.sent3: The dog barked twerpiest when the mailman arrived.
meanings.sent4: The alarm clock rang twerpiest, waking me up abruptly.
meanings.sent5: The car horn honked twerpiest in the middle of the night.

meanings.definition: the person or thing that is the most annoying or irritating
meanings.sent1: She's the twerpiest in our group, always causing trouble.
meanings.sent2: The twerpiest in the office is the one who never stops complaining.
meanings.sent3: The twerpiest in the class is the student who always interrupts the teacher.
meanings.sent4: The twerpiest in the neighborhood is the dog that barks all night.
meanings.sent5: The twerpiest at the party was the guy who kept spilling drinks on everyone.
